channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drugs, mattress, bin bags, broken bushes, 7th July
item.description:
People are flytipping Mattress and other large rubbish, loads of tree / bush waste aswell. the whole car park needs a clean as you can see loads of drug canisters and rubish all around the edges of the car park and around the fences
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bell Street, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hole in road, 7th July
item.description:
Road collapsed when car was driving up the road. Cars right front wheel fell into the hole. Fire brigade pulled car out of hole left it abandoned outside our house. The collapse happened about 01:20 07/07/2025.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buttmarsh Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandonded car, 7th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bell Street, Charlton, London

item.title: Litter on Tottenham road N1, 7th July
item.description:
We used to have a regular street cleaner who was great - he kept the street looking so clean and tidy. We haven’t seen him for a while and the street is looking very unkept. There is a lot of food rubbish, leaves & dog poo building up. Please Address asap.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tottenham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bushes obstructing windows, 7th July
item.description:
The first request has been sent 1 week ago, and even though it has been marked as solved, the issue is clearly not solved. Overgrown bushes right in front of the window of building 233-319 Villas Road. These haven’t been cut in over a year, and with the hot and dry weather they pose a fire hazard risks, on top of obstructing the windows. Please send someone over to trim them

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Villas Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking in bus lane during its hours of operation, 7th July
item.description:
Almost daily for months there have been cars parked on the bus lane on green lanes during the bus lane's hours of operation (4-7 weekdays) when parking is prohibited. It blocks the bus lane and really slows down traffic in an area which is already very traffic heavy at that time of day. Could you please send out some parking wardens?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Green Lanes, Bowes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
